00071                 protected function set_credentials($realname = '', $email = '', $url = '')
00072                 {
00073                         $credentials = $realname . '%%' . $email . '%%' . $url;
00074                         $encoded = Base64::encode($credentials);
00075                         Cookie::set('_vc', $encoded, Time::next_year());
00076                 }
00077 
00082                 protected function get_credentials()
00083                 {
00084                         $parts = array('', '', '');
00085                         if (($encoded = Cookie::get('_vc')) !== NULL)
00086                         {
00087                                 $credentials = Base64::decode($encoded);
00088                                 $parts = explode('%%', $credentials);
00089                         }
00090                         return array_combine(array('realname', 'email', 'url'), $parts);
00091                 }
00092 
00097                 protected function check_auth()
00098                 {
00099                         if (!Login::is_logged_in())
00100                         {
00101                                 $_SESSION['redirect_to'] = array('controller' => $this->name, 'action' => $this->action);
00102                                 $this->flash('Login is required to access the page you requested!', 'warning');
00103                                 $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'login'));
00104                         }
00105                 }

00124                 protected function block_ip()
00125                 {
00126                         // Return if BLOCK_IPS is not set
00127                         if (!BLOCK_IPS)
00128                                 return;
00129                         if (BlockedIp::is_blocked($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']))
00130                         {
00131                                 $bv = new BlockedVisit();
00132                                 $bv->save();
00133                                 die(l('Sorry, your IP address is currently blacklisted'));
00134                         }
00135                 }

00141                 protected function add_acronyms()
00142                 {
00143                         $acronyms = array('URI' => 'Uniform Resource Identifier',
00144                                 'URL' => 'Uniform Resource Locator',
00145                                 'CSS' => 'Cascading Style Sheets',
00146                                 'JSP' => 'JavaServer Pages',
00147                                 'XML' => 'eXtensible Markup Language',
00148                                 'SMS' => 'Short Message System',
00149                                 'JSF' => 'JavaServer Faces',
00150                                 'HTTP' => 'HyperText Transfer Protocol',
00151                                 'GWT' => 'Google Web Toolkit');
00152                         $patterns = array();
00153                         $replacements = array();
00154                         foreach ($acronyms as $acronym => $explanation)
00155                         {
00156                                 $expl = h($explanation);
00157                                 $patterns[] = "/([^_\-a-z0-9])($acronym)([^_\-a-z0-9])/i";
00158                                 $replacements[] = "$1<acronym title=\"$expl\">$2</acronym>$3";
00159                         }
00160                         $this->response->body = preg_replace($patterns,
00161                                 $replacements,
00162                                 $this->response->body);
00163                 }
00164 
00169                 protected function morse_encode()
00170                 {
00171                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00172                                 array(
00173                                         '/-->/',
00174                                         '/\/\*/',
00175                                         '/\*\//',
00176                                         '/>([^<]*)</e',
00177                                         '/(alt|title|content)="([^"]*)"/e',
00178                                         '/ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½/',
00179                                         '/###/',
00180                                         '/%%%/',
00181                                 ),
00182                                 array(
00183                                         'ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½',
00184                                         '###',
00185                                         '%%%',
00186                                         "'>'.Morse::encode('\\1').'<'",
00187                                         "'\\1=\"'.Morse::encode('\\2').'\"'",
00188                                         '-->',
00189                                         '/*',
00190                                         '*/',
00191                                 ),
00192                                 $this->response->body);
00193                 }
00194 
00199                 protected function shrink_html()
00200                 {
00201                         return;
00202                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00203                                 array(
00204                                         '/\s+|\n/',
00205                                         '/>\s+</',
00206                                         "/> <(\/?)(p|link|meta|div|h|body|title|script|style|!--|ul|ol|li|dl|dd|dt|option|th|td|tr|table|tbody|thead|tfoot)/",
00207                                         "/<(p|link|meta|div|h|body|title|script|style|!--|ul|ol|li|dl|dd|dt|option|th|td|tr|table|tbody|thead|tfoot)([^>]*)> </",
00208                                 ),
00209                                 array(
00210                                         ' ',
00211                                         '> <',
00212                                         '><\1\2',
00213                                         '<\1\2><',
00214                                 ),
00215                                 $this->response->body);
00216                 }

00224                 protected function sanskrit_ambra()
00225                 {
00226                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00227                                 array(
00228                                         "/&([^;]+);/",
00229                                         "/>([^<]*)</e",
00230                                         "/<&([^;]+);>/",
00231                                 ),
00232                                 array(
00233                                         "<&\\1;>",
00234                                         "'>'.Sanskrit::encode('\\1').'<'",
00235                                         "&\\1;",
00236                                 ),
00237                                 $this->response->body);
00238                 }

00244                 protected function spot_people()
00245                 {
00246                         if (preg_match("/^194\.242\./", $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) > 0)
00247                         {
00248                                 if (!isset($_COOKIE['_aknet']))
00249                                 {
00250                                         $email = new Email(array('name' => 'Emeraldion Lodge',
00251                                                 'email' => 'webmaster@emeraldion.it',
00252                                                 'text' => 'Ti informo che ï¿½ stata effettuata una visita da aknet.it'));
00253                                         $email->send();
00254                                         Cookie::set('_aknet', TRUE, Time::tomorrow());
00255                                 }
00256                         }
00257                         else if (preg_match("/^147\.163\./", $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) > 0)
00258                         {
00259                                 if (!isset($_COOKIE['_unipa']))
00260                                 {
00261                                         $email = new Email(array('name' => 'Emeraldion Lodge',
00262                                                 'email' => 'webmaster@emeraldion.it',
00263                                                 'text' => 'Ti informo che ï¿½ stata effettuata una visita da unipa.it'));
00264                                         $email->send();
00265                                         Cookie::set('_unipa', TRUE, Time::tomorrow());
00266                                 }
00267                         }
00268                 }

00278                 protected function load_part_contents($filename)
00279                 {
00280                         $localized_filename = @preg_replace("/\.([^\.]+)$/",
00281                                 "-{$_COOKIE['hl']}.\\1",
00282                                 $filename);
00283                         if (file_exists($localized_filename))
00284                         {
00285                                 $contents = file_get_contents($localized_filename);
00286                         }
00287                         else
00288                         {
00289                                 if (!file_exists($filename))
00290                                 {
00291                                         HTTP::error(500);
00292                                 }
00293                                 $contents = file_get_contents($filename);
00294                         }
00295                         return $this->strip_external_php_tags($contents);
00296                 }
00297 
00305                 protected function include_localized($filename)
00306                 {
00307                         $localized_filename = @preg_replace("/\.([^\.]+)$/",
00308                                 "-{$_COOKIE['hl']}.\\1",
00309                                 $filename);
00310                         if (file_exists($localized_filename))
00311                         {
00312                                 include($localized_filename);
00313                         }
00314                         else
00315                         {
00316                                 if (!file_exists($filename))
00317                                 {
00318                                         HTTP::error(500);
00319                                 }
00320                                 include($filename);
00321                         }
00322                 }
00323         }
